text: Michael Donald "Mike" Brown (born August 5, 1953) was a shadow senator from the District of Columbia. As a shadow senator, Brown receives no pay from the government, receives no budget from the government, and cannot vote on matters before the Senate. While he does not have an office in the United States Senate, the Government of the District provides the position with an office. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:United States Shadow senators from District of Columbia Category:Politicians from Newark, New Jersey Category:Independent politicians in the United States
title: Michael Donald Brown
